description: |-
  Validate that a string is a fully qualified domain name (FQDN).
---

# function: fqdn

Returns true when the input string is a valid FQDN.

## Example Usage

```terraform
locals {
  names = ["example.com", "app.prod.example.com"]
}

output "fqdn_example" {
  value = [
    for n in local.names : {
      value = n
      valid = provider::validatefx::fqdn(n)
    }
  ]
}
```

## Signature

<!-- signature generated by tfplugindocs -->
```text
fqdn(value string) bool
```

## Arguments

<!-- arguments generated by tfplugindocs -->
1. `value` (String, Nullable) String value to validate.
